Text: C'est le Gus van Sant? Je suis un fan qui n'a pas vu ce film, genial!

Based on the spoken languages this must be the Bruno Dumont movie from 2003, not the one (29 Palms) from 2002: 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0315110/
Ooops sorry - Im a big Bruno Dumont fan as well. reason why I took one for the other. Quite similar styles somehow. thank you for it!
